firstNightReminder: Wake the Visitor. Show them a character token in-play.
otherNightReminder: The Visitor points to a player. If they choose the player with the character token, show them the head signal (nod "yes", shake "no") for when they find the correct player. If they chose the correct player, Then wake the player they chose and show them the "This character selected you card" then the Visitor token. Show them the "You are" card and then the cured marker. Finally, place the known marker on the Visitor.
name: Visitor
ability: You start knowing a townsfolk in play. Until you find them, each night*, choose a player. If they are the role, both of you are cured. You cannot get false info from infections.

firstNightReminder: The Psychologist chooses a townsfolk character from the character sheet. Then wake an evil player of your choice and show them the "This character selected you card", then the Psychologist token. Show the "mad about being" marker, then that character token.
name: Psychologist
ability: On your first night, choose a townsfolk character (except your role). An evil player is mad about being this character or they might die. If you are mad about your role, you might die instead.

firstNightReminder: The Epidemiologist points to a player. Then show them a number from 1 to 5. 1 being "very cold" to 5 being "Bingo".
otherNightReminder: If the decoy died, remove the decoy reminder token. The Epidemiologist points to a player. Then show them a number from 1 to 5. 1 being "very cold" to 5 being "Bingo".
name: Epidemiologist
ability: Each night, choose a player. You learn how close they are to the current alive demon. There is a player that registers as a demon.

firstNightReminder: The Lab Technician points to two players. Show them how many are infected as of now by giving a number from 0 to 2. Then show them how many are evil by giving a number from 0 to 2.
otherNightReminder: The Lab Technician points to two players. Show them how many are infected as of now by giving a number from 0 to 2. Then show them how many are evil by giving a number from 0 to 2.
name: Lab Technician
ability: Each night, choose 2 players. You learn how many are infected and how many are evil. Outsiders register as evil to you.

otherNightReminder: The Surgeon either shows a "no" head signal or points to a player. If the player they target is infected, put the cured marker on their character. Otherwise, the target might die.
name: Surgeon
ability: Each night*, you may choose a player. If they are infected when you choose them, they are cured. Otherwise, they might die.

otherNightReminder: One-by-one, each Nurse points to a player. If the target is infected, wake them and show them the "You are" card, then the infected reminder token.
name: Nurse
ability: Each night*, choose a player. If good and infected, they learn if they are infected. [+0 or +1 Nurse] [Maximum of 2 true Nurses]

otherNightReminder: Wake the Receptionist and point to all players that have a cured reminder token.
name: Receptionist
ability: Each night*, you know which players have been cured and how many of them are evil.

otherNightReminder: The Diener chooses a dead player, if any. Show them a thumb-up (if good) or a thumb-down (if evil). Then show them the head signal (nod "yes", shake "no") for whether or not they are infected. If the dead player they chose is infected, you may put an infected reminder on the Diener.
name: Diener
ability: Each night*, you may choose a dead player. You learn their alignment and you learn if they are infected. If the dead player is infected, you might get infected.

firstNightReminder: You may point to whoever the demon has chosen tonight, if possible. If the Paramedic nods (yes), remove any effects from the demon target(s) and then put the cured and protected reminder tokens on the target. Put the no ability reminder on the Paramedic.
otherNightReminder: If the Paramedic still has an ability, you may point to whoever the demon has chosen tonight. If the Paramedic nods (yes), remove any effects from the target(s) and then put the cured and protected reminder tokens on the target.
name: Paramedic
ability: Each night, while you still can save a player, you might learn who the demon has chosen tonight. Once per game, at night, you may choose to save and cure them.

otherNightReminder: The Immunologist either shows a "yes" head or a "no" head signal. If they show a yes, put the vaccinate reminder token on the demon. Then choose which infected players live or die. Infected players that live are immediately cured.
name: Immunologist
ability: Once per game, at night*, you may choose to use the vaccine. Each infected player (except the demon) must either die or be cured. Only up to 2 infected can be cured.

otherNightReminder: The Pharmacist either shows a "no" head signal or points to up to 2 players. Those players are then immediately cured.
name: Pharmacist
ability: Once per game, at night*, choose up to 2 players. They are cured.

otherNightReminder: The Inoculator either shows a "yes" head or a "no" head signal. If they say yes, put the no deaths reminder token on the demon. No-one dies or becomes infected tonight.
name: Inoculator
ability: Once per game, at night*, you may choose to prevent any infections or death caused by infections from occurring that night and dawn.

firstNightReminder: Put the not chosen reminder token on the Germaphobe. The moment a player (other than the demon) chooses the Germophobe tonight, remove the reminder token. At the end of the night, if the not chosen marker is still on the Germaphobe, remove the chosen reminder, if any.
otherNightReminder: Put the not chosen reminder token on the Germaphobe. The moment a player (other than the demon) chooses the Germophobe tonight, remove the reminder token. At the end of the night, if the not chosen marker is still on the Germaphobe, remove the chosen reminder, if any.
name: Germaphobe
ability: If no-one chooses you in the night (except the Demon), you cannot be infected tonight. If only 3 players live, you lose this ability.

firstNightReminder: If the Inpatient is infected, you may put an infected token on one of their neighbors.
otherNightReminder: If the Inpatient is infected, you may put an infected token on one of their neighbors.
name: Inpatient
ability: If you are infected, each night, one of your neighbors might also become infected.

firstNightReminder: Wake the demon and show them the Schizophrenic token and point to the Schizophrenic. Then the demon points to a character. Wake the Schizophrenic and show them the "mad about being" marker and show them the token they are mad about.
otherNightReminder: Wake the demon and show them the Schizophrenic token and point to the Schizophrenic. Then the demon points to a character. Wake the Schizophrenic and show them the "mad about being" marker and show them the token they are mad about.
name: Schizophrenic
ability: The demon knows who you are. Each night, the demon makes you mad about a good character. If you break madness today, one of your alive neighbors becomes infected.

otherNightReminder: The Graveyard Nurse points to a player. If the target is good and not infected, wake them and show them the "You are" card, then the infected reminder token. If the target is a minion, place the act twice marker on their character. They act twice tonight.
name: Graveyard Nurse
ability: You think you are a nurse. Each night*, choose a player. If good, they learn false Nurse info. If they are a minion, they may act twice tonight. You might register as a Nurse.

otherNightReminder: The Janitor points to a different player from last night. Place the chosen marker on their character. If either the Janitor or the target is infected, both are infected.
name: Janitor
ability: Each night*, you must choose a player (not the same as last night). If either of you were infected, both of you become infected.

firstNightReminder: The Lobotomist points to a player. If infected, the target is Lobotomized.
otherNightReminder: The previous players are no longer lobotomized. The Lobotomist points to a player. If infected, the target is Lobotomized.
name: Lobotomist
ability: Each night, choose a player. If they are infected and vote tomorrow, they instantly die. If only 3 players live, your ability targets the demon. Only 1 player can die per vote.

otherNightReminder: If a player died today, the Reaper either shows a "no" head signal or points to recently dead player. If chosen, wake the dead player. Show the "This character selected you card" then the Reaper token. Then, you may point to a good player and show a thumb-up. During the day, announce the removed ghost vote.
name: Reaper
ability: Each night*, you may choose a player that died today. You take away their ghost vote, but they might learn a good player. You can only pick evil once.

name: Bio-Terrorist
ability: If you publicly claim to be the Bio-Terrorist and are executed, two healthy players become infected. If outsiders are executed, they infect a healthy player.

otherNightReminder: The previous players are no longer contaminated. The Quack Doctor points to a player. They are contaminated. Then wake the contaminated player and show them the "This character selected you card", then the Quack Doctor token. Put the contaminated player to sleep.
name: Quack Doctor
ability: Each night*, choose a player. They learn they were chosen, and if either the player or any target is infected when the contaminated player uses their ability, they all are infected before using their ability.

firstNightReminder: Point to all players that are infected. The Bacteria points to a player. They become infected. Place the chosen marker on their character. At dawn, convert the chosen markers into infected markers and check if any of the infected players will die.
otherNightReminder: Point to all players that are infected. The Bacteria points to a player. They become infected. Place the chosen marker on their character. At dawn, convert the chosen markers into infected markers and check if any of the infected players will die.
name: Bacteria
ability: Each night, you learn infections then choose a good player to infect. You are permanently infected. The first player to choose you each night is infected and poisoned.

firstNightReminder: Choose an infected player and infect one of their healthy alive neighbors. At dawn, check if any of the infected players will die.
otherNightReminder: The Fungus points to a player. They become infected. Place the chosen marker on their character. Then, choose an infected player and infect one of their healthy alive neighbors. At dawn, convert the chosen markers into infected markers and check if any of the infected players will die.
name: Fungus
ability: Each night*, choose a good player to infect. You are permanently infected. Each night, exactly 1 infected player infects a healthy alive neighbor. [-1 Outsider]

otherNightReminder: The Virus then points to a player. They become infected. Place the chosen marker on their character. At dawn, convert the chosen markers into infected markers and check if any of the infected players will die. If they infect a minion, change their minion and wake them and show them the "You are" card and their new minion role. Minions chosen by the demon will act twice tomorrow night.
name: Virus
ability: Each night*, choose a player to infect. You are permanently infected. If you infect a minion, they change into a not-in-play minion and act twice tomorrow night. [+1 Outsider]

firstNightReminder: Point to all players that are infected. The Parasite picks players a player. When they do, put the host reminder on the player they chose.
otherNightReminder: Point to all players that are infected. The Parasite points to a player. They become infected. Place the chosen marker on their character. At dawn, convert the chosen markers into infected markers and check if any of the infected players will die.
name: Parasite
ability: Each night*, you learn infections then choose a good player to infect. On your first night, choose a player to infect and poison. You can’t die until they die. If an alive infected player neighbors the host, they die at dawn.
